meanings.definition: A type of white wine made from the Chardonnay grape.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a glass of chardonnay with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a bottle of chardonnay for the table.
meanings.sent3: The chardonnay whispered sweet stories to the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The chardonnay danced gracefully on the palate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of chardonnay filled the room, inviting everyone to relax.

meanings.sent1: He sipped the chardonnay slowly, savoring every drop.
meanings.sent2: The waiter brought a chilled chardonnay to the table.
meanings.sent3: The chardonnay in his hand seemed to sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled like a glass of chardonnay.
meanings.sent5: The golden hue of the chardonnay glowed in the candlelight.

meanings.sent1: The vineyard was filled with ripe chardonnay grapes ready for harvest.
meanings.sent2: She plucked a bunch of chardonnay grapes from the vine.
meanings.sent3: The chardonnay grapes glistened like tiny pearls in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The sweetness of the chardonnay grapes lingered on her lips.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chardonnay grapes filled the air with a fruity fragrance.
